titleStmt.title: Unto the right honourable the Lords of Councill and Session the report, representation, and petition, of the Committee of Advocats, appointed by Your Lordships to meet with the stent-masters of Edinburgh.
titleStmt.author: Faculty of Advocates (Edinburgh, Scotland)
Scotland. Court of Session.

notesStmt.note: Concerns meeting between committee of Faculty of Advocates and stent-masters of Edinburgh about share of taxation payable by city of Edinburgh.
Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
